summary: The **New York Times** is a famous American newspaper from New York City. It's been around since 1851 and is known for its detailed reports on news from the U.S. and around the world. It has a large number of subscribers, both in print and online. The newspaper is owned by the Ochs-Sulzberger family. Over time, it has broken important stories, like the Pentagon Papers about the Vietnam War. The Times has also been involved in important court cases that protect freedom of the press. Today, it has many digital offerings, like websites, podcasts, and games.
title: The New York Times
